form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Hagerty introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit sanctuary jurisdictions from receiving community development block grants.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Community Development Block Grants for Sanctuary Cities Act.

section.header: Ineligibility of sanctuary jurisdictions for community development block grants
section.text: Title I of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 (42 U.S.C. 5301 et seq.) is amended—

paragraph.text: in section 102(a) (42 U.S.C. 5302(a)), by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: Except as provided in subparagraph (B), the term sanctuary jurisdiction means any State or political subdivision of a State that has in effect a statute, ordinance, policy, or practice that prohibits or restricts any government entity or official from—

clause.text: sending, receiving, maintaining, or exchanging with any Federal, State, or local government entity information regarding the citizenship or immigration status (lawful or unlawful) of any individual; or

complying with a request lawfully made by the Department of Homeland Security under section 236 or 287 of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1226, 1357) to comply with a detainer for, or notify about the release of, an individual.

subparagraph.text: A State or political subdivision of a State shall not be deemed a sanctuary jurisdiction based solely on its having a policy whereby its officials will not share information regarding, or comply with a request made by the Department of Homeland Security under section 236 or 287 of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1226, 1357) to comply with a detainer regarding, an individual who comes forward as a victim or a witness to a criminal offense.
in paragraph (5), by striking and at the end;
by redesignating paragraph (6) as paragraph (7); and
by inserting after paragraph (5) the following:

paragraph.text: the grantee is not a sanctuary jurisdiction and will not become a sanctuary jurisdiction during the period for which the grantee receives a grant under this title; and
